#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define N 5000001
#define ll long long int
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
template<class T>
void scan(T &x)
{
    register T c = gc();
    x = 0;
    T neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
int main()
{
    int k,i,n;
    	scan(n);
        scan(k);
        k--;
    	int a[n];
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    	{
    		cin>>a[i];
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
			cout<<a[k]<<endl;
		
    
}
